review: This is AMAZING!!! Im so glad I ordered this! I use to love Chromecast but this Fire TV Stick has WAY more to offer! It's easy to install and perfect for my 5 year old to manuver through the many apps and channels available.  The picture on my flat screen seems to be clearer when watching anything on the Fire TV Stick.  No need for Cable anymore!!!  I truly recommend this to anyone!!!
author: tamaiden

review: It's not working as well as I expected.
author: momaplunk

review: The only thing that would make it better and possibly 5 star is voice search.  Otherwise works just as good as the Amazon Fire TV, which is great!!!
author: Roland P Michaud

review: Love it.  Easy set up. Must buy especially if you have Prime Access.
author: David Smith

review: Does everything it's supposed to.  Straightforward, easy to operate.  Adds value to a simple TV setup (no cable, just local, plus Netflix).
author: Kindle Customer "Freein08"

review: Much nicer than the Chromecast I have. Makes watching movies as easy as turning on the TV.
author: James A. Webb
